      public static <T> java.util.ArrayList<T> loadFrom​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.Class<T> tclass)
      loads an array of deserialized items of type T from the filename.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object to be deserialized
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to laod from
      tclass - the class of the object deserialized
      Returns:
      an array of deserialized objects

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the serialized object
      Parameters:

      list - the list to be serialized
